reviews.review_text: Between 5 pm to 10 pm is extremely busy, and the sauna for men doesn t work. Staff are friendly, group classes are great, cleanness is perfect.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you for sharing your rating and feedback with our team Atena.

reviews.review_text: Nice clean facility, good selection of equipment and great Fitness classes. It even has a private womens area
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you so much for sharing your review and feedback!

reviews.review_text: Good service I love their massage  chair. Big gym lo e working out sign up for ur 3 days trail
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you for the 5 stars and for being part of the GoodLife community! See you for your next workout.

reviews.review_text: The space is great,I use it since 2016. If you like sauna its always broken, the place try to keep it running, but some people cant understand water in the resistance does not work.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you for taking the time to reach out and share your feedback. We sincerely appreciate your support and will have management review accordingly.

reviews.review_text: I had a great experience with a trainer here. Trainer asked for my workout goal and time frame, constructed a solid work out routine, along with many knowledgeable fitness tips during the sessions. Trainer does not waste time on any routines that I do not prefer. Each workout session was great, fun and fried from him pushing the max out of me. Really recommend Joseph the trainer here. Solid guy. Gym itself is great. Lots of facilities. But may get crowded during rush hours.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you for your Review and letting us know about your experience with Personal Training. Were so happy to hear that Joseph was able to help you on your Fitness Journey. :)

reviews.review_text: If you like crazy busy gyms and stalking people for their machines, then this is the gym for you. I stay at the Element hotel every month for work and I use this Goodlife because its conveniently in the same building. I wish the drop in fee wasnt so much, but I was given some free entries, so I cant complain. I like the staff and lots of fit people.

I have been working out this gym since 2020 . The most difficult time during the COVID . I remember That time only limited members allowed one hour to work out .  Everybody was kind nervous and must wear the masks all the time . But everyone was working out hard and kind of feeling strong and positive . Really appreciate this gym kept opening during covid .  Thank God that the COVID is ended . Personally I really love this gym as it s big and modern plus The facilities are great . Staffs are very friendly... especially the coaches..I also introduced a male friend of mine to the gym and he bought one year personal training with the coach Louis . And I introduced another female friend to joined the gym to I have One suggestion   that hope the owner can read it . ( I suggested managers several times but not working . ) . If this gym has the rule ( No Heavy weights smashing ) that May help this gym environment in a safer . harmony . and may help the business grow. My suggestion is Please put a Sign ( don t drop weights heavily) next to the all weights areas that I saw in other gyms has it which is really help . Please let the stafffs especially the sales team Educate all new members + old members should drop the weights carefully not drop the weights very heavily that can make a huge noise and the floor is shaking . This second floor is standing so much  massive weighs include the hundreds heavy metal machines and heavy weights . Plus the busy crowd . How much weights total are in this gym ? I m worrying about mostly because it s on Second floor not on the ground . I will never worry about this issue if it s on the ground floor . I really don t like the some clients smash the weights so loudly which is hurting others ears   and feelings as well .. please support me if anyone saw my suggestion here that you are thinking sane as me . Peace   and love
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you for an amazing 5 star review! We can definitely help pass along your concerns regarding the noise level at the club for our team to review. We appreciate having you as a member and hope you enjoy your next workout

reviews.review_text: Great place for a workout with a lot of machines and weights available. Lockers are very spacious and their virtual reality cardio room is pretty cool.
Huge space and good facilities , only if they could control the prices . but amazing place to workout
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you for sharing this excellent rating and feedback!

reviews.review_text: This place has an inviting atmosphere No mater what fitness level you are,you feel comfortable and positive. The facility are nice and clean. Please schedule more RPM and body pump
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you for sharing this excellent rating and feedback!

reviews.review_text: I can say nothing but good things about this place. Went in to inquire about membership.  Had a tour of the facility.  I cannot fathom Bonnie Henrys reasons for closing gyms. The entire gym was sparkling clean. You could tell that very high standards are kept in place here. The two staff members I reacted with were fantastic. I came away with everything I needed to know.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you for your review and feedback Doug! Were happy to hear about your positive experience visiting the club and we hope to welcome you back sometime soon for a workout

reviews.review_text: The gym went back to  the 24 hours schedule for three weeks and now they cancelled again. I was waiting the 24 hours schedule during all the pandemic. I love this gym cause its near at 10 minutes from home and 10 from my work, I start to work at 6 am on the morning everyday with no specific end timing usually 7pm. The last three weeks I was on the gym at 4:00am (my only time possible) with a couple people around. Perfect for the circuits and bi series of workout talking about the machines and everything. Thats impossible in the weekdays on rush hours. Everyone knows that the workouts its different for each person so I think some people have different needs including to reach their goals muscle gain, losing weight etc. Thats why the 24 hours could works too and with less people around its safer than the rush hours.  Im thinking to going today and cancel my membership and going to another one with the 24/7 hours service. Anyway Im a simple person who lose 40 kgs 12 years ago trying to keep and maintain his weight. My two cents.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you for sharing this feedback with us Carlos. We hope to resume 24 hour operations in the future. We appreciate your patience and support.

reviews.review_text: I switched from a different gym recently because I wanted to go to a 24 hour gym. The staff has been amazing! I have loved my experience so far. When I signed up I was told  a lot of great things about the gym. I didn t expect much but I m happy to say it has all been true so far. The gym is well maintained and the atmosphere is awesome and encouraging. I have been exceeding my goals and hope to continue to do so!
Nice club, helpful staff. MaSSAGE CHAIRS are the bomb!!!! Changing rooms are top notch. Hoping to see more GoodLife clubs around the Vancouver area!

Tristan was very helpful, I was looking for the  component as an attachment for the dual pulley rowing machine equipment, Tristan was able to locate it for me, it was indeed an excellent  customer service.

The gym has a great atmosphere and all the equipment is new. If anything is broken. It is usually fixed within a couple days. The staff is really friendly. The general manager (Ben) is really helpful every time i visit. I love working out at this gym and would highly recommend it to anyone.
Great gym. Spacious and has everything you need.

Love this gym! Been going to GoodLife for 5 years now, and couldnt be happier! The staff is always super friendly and welcoming. If youre looking for a gym in Burnaby, even if you live in Vancouver, this one is worth the drive!

This gym is beyond good. Before the pandemic they were amazing, but since the pandemic theyve gotten even BETTER.The staff is so on top of making sure to clean , enforce the masks and cleaning. The staff ALWAYS have a huge smile and are willing to help with pretty much anything. I dont even see them as workers at the gym, everyone here is a friend. Theyre so welcoming and helpful if you want to join a gym do yourself a favour and join good life Metrotown. They have some of the best employees ive ever met anywhere not only at a gym. Ilona, Stephen and the whole team are AMAZING cant rave about everyone here enough!!!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you for the amazing in depth, 5 star review Nick! Were always happy to hear of the amazing job the associates are doing at the club for our members and were lucky to have you as a member! We wish you all the best on your fitness goals here at the club

reviews.review_text: Great gym. Awesome Staff. Jared is the man, went above and beyond to show me around and make me feel welcome. Keep up the good work! Thanks
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you for sharing this wonderful rating and feedback!

reviews.review_text: I signed up for the premium ($56) plan and Im very satisfied. The business is opened 24/7, has brand new fitness equipment, good variety and number of machines (no line-ups) and very decent change rooms. My wife also signed up and she could find a good variety of classes, all included in the premium plan. One cool thing about the classes is that, if youre unable to attend to one of the scheduled times, you can play video instructions on the rooms wall projector at any time. This is a very spatious place and, in addition to the common area, there is also an area for personal training, and a workout area for women only (although many of them prefer to use the common area because it has a better variety of machines). After my first week, I dont have one single reason to complain about it.

Its the best gym hands down that I have been to, huge selection of free weights(more then any other gym), has alot of different machines, I got good service when I was wanting a membership. I didnt wait 45 minutes to get a membership like people say, and for the guy who said they wouldnt accept your cash, well it states that right on their website so do some research before you falsely accuse them of not accepting your cash.

It was my first time at this gym in a long time and the first time since the COVID-19 crisis.  Im super impressed with how the staff is handling the situation.  The gym is also huge so plenty of space to workout without having anyone in your way.

One of the best gym in canada. Staff is amazing. Last but not least Ben (general manager) is one of the best guy on this planet. He is always looking forward to help members out, no matter how busy he is. Love this gym.

Great gym. Lots of space and equipment. Tons of cardio equipment and different weight machines and free weights. Dumbbells up to 100lbs. Multiple squat racks and deadlift platforms. Very clean and staff are very friendly. The locker rooms are more like a hotels with shampoo and body wash in each shower stall. Has a co-ed main gym as well as a womens only seperate section accessed through the womens locker room. Massive spin class room and even bigger room with a screen for group fitness and yoga classes. And a great location a block from Metrotown mall and a couple blocks from the skytrain station. And very affordable in terms of memberships

Great Staff and place to workout. Hope they get wifi soon.. UPDATED ON OCTOBER 16, 2018.... Some time ago I put great staff and place to workout, things have changed. The old staff is gone which is understandable as people tend to move on, the place is now starting to show lack of maintenance on the equipment, the washrooms are not being cleaned and they still have no wifi.  My husband and I have decided to cancel our membership as were paying $120.00 per month for what? When we went to the front counter to speak about cancelling, the woman said ok and she proceeded to cancel. No questions like, may I ask if there is anything I can do to change your mind or assist you with, just a simple ok. Our membership expires in November which we are going to check out places like Steve Nash, Anytime Fitness and other places. The only staff member there is the person who signed us up is Jared. Maybe we should reach out to him but we feel now the damage is done. Goodlife fitness, retaining your clients, keeping the place clean, up with the maintenance and give the dam wifi like you have used as your sales pitch may keep your members and bring in even more. Everything about this post is true, so what excuses or lies are you prepared to give.... Yours Truly Davi and Marc

The nicest gym in the area, clean facility, towels available, the most friendly staff, reasonable pricing on personal training and memberships, and parking isn t a problem compared to other gyms. It may be busy in the gym, but I don t find that a problem; people generally don t mind if you work in with them. ~~~~~ They also offer physio and chiro, and if you are looking for a physio, ask to see Clarence Wong!!! I saw him for IMS/Dry Needling two days ago. He is super outgoing, professional, and gets the job done quick and well. I ve seen other physios before and he is by far the best. I will definitely go back to see him for all of my future physio needs  :) 5/5.
Parking in the merchant parking area in P2 is very convenient. Remember to validate your parking in the gym! Gym is very nice - one of the nicest Ive been to.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you for sharing this wonderful feedback and amazing rating James!

reviews.review_text: Its a busy but clean gym.  I moved from another gym to this one because its so huge and has great classes.  When I got injured and couldnt go to the gym for awhile they put a hold on my membership without any issues. Definitely recommend this location. :)

This gym has a studio that you can use for no extra cost to your membership. Its really good if you want to do your own personal cardio away from everyone else in the gym. Definitely recommend this gym!

Awesome fitness center. Mark is a professional trainer that is friendly and know what he is doing. He put me with an excellent trainer after my check-up who is excellent too, they are helping me getting back on track with my nutrition, mood, and shape. I have checked a lot of different places where price where way higher but with poor trainers or poor facility. Steve Nash cant compete against GoodLife and many other dont get to their ankles...
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks for sharing your experience, Ralph! Were happy you are enjoying your personal training sessions and that we can be a part of your fitness journey.

reviews.review_text: Probably the best gym in Burnaby. Has everything you need. There are plenty of classes. Has a bicycle room and a studio. Sauna is included of course. Full members can also bring a +1 so it can be perfect for a couple that goes together.
I have two favourite gyms in Canada...this is one of them. Exceptional service, good equipment, great atmosphere, great staff. Thank you.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you for the amazing 5-star review, Tara! Were appreciate knowing the club is one of your favorite locations, and we hope to welcome you back soon for another great workout

reviews.review_text: good service and nice stuff, lots of things to use. But got too many people and kind expensive member fees. Otherwise is all good.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you for your review and feedback, Darius. We hope to welcome you back for another great workout sometime soon

reviews.review_text: Ben & the team at Burnaby Sovereign are fantastic! They not only run a very welcoming gym but they also support youth events in our community. A big thank you for your recent generous donation to our track clubs fundraiser.

Having an awesome time at GoodLife fitness Burnaby.if youre looking for a welcoming atmosphere with state-of-the-art equipment look no further than GoodLife fitness Burnaby. For all of your fitness needs and anyone looking to take their fitness to the next level see my friend Tami and get yourself set up, many thanks Jerry :-)

When I was living in Vancouver I used to work out at Goodlife Fitness Burnaby, I always liked to work out there and how the staff treated me, and also the manager Max was super kind and attentive to me. Good luck Guys!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you for the amazing rating and review Daniel!

reviews.review_text: Exemplary staff member: I came to a piece of equipment and the previous guy didnt wipe it down, despite COVID-19 policies. Honestly, I expected that sometimes, and I wouldve just wiped it myself. One staff saw this, and set the example by making this person come back and wipe it down. Couldnt ask for better diligence!

Visiting Van and attended thus GL. Very spacious and clean Goodlife. Very friendly staff. Womens Only is often old equipment and cramped for space, but this is the nicest Womens Only I think Ive seen in the country.
Great facilites and staff with free parking. Always clean but it gets really busy during rush hours. Biggest drawback (for me at least) in this gym is there is no WiFi whatsoever.

One of the most well maintained and well equipped gym in the city...its great to see the separate women section with proper training materials.. parking is at P2 level which is free provided you register your vehicle at the gym entrance.. Showers and washrooms are almost always clean ..overall nice and relaxing environment....
Pretty convenient. Can register your car for free parking. I like that you have to book for an appointment to limit the amount of people in there at once
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you for the wonderful rating and review Nikki! Your support means the world to us!

reviews.review_text: Had a good experience with Hamza. He gave me a good explanation about the gym and I was happy to register for PT as well.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you for the wonderful 5-star review, Mark! We appreciate t he kind words regarding Hamzas helpfulness and we hope to welcome you back soon for a great workout

reviews.review_text: One of my favourite GoodLife fitness clubs. Staff are super friendly. Lots of room to get a stretch in, work out, have a yoga session and relax post your work out!

I really enjoy Kates bootcamp every Tuesday and Thursday at 930am. Its like a small group personal training session (2-5 ppl) of HIIT type workouts with equipment and body weight exercises. Its $200 for 12 sessions and well worth it.

Jean and Clarence from LifeMark provided excellent physiotherapy treatment 10/10 would reccomend! Definitely worth my trip out of Richmond to be treated. Great to be located inside a gym and Jean was able to assess and perscribe exercises for selfcare.
My Fave gym with the best facilities! I love the Body Jam Class, get the ultimate package a go, you wouldn t regret it!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you for the amazing rating!

reviews.review_text: Have been to at least a dozen gyms in the van/Burnaby area and this is by far the best. Excellent equipment in perfect condition, lots of room, friendly/helpful staff

Love this location! Staff is awesome and knowledgeable, trainers are very good, it does get busy during peak times but that s just cause everyone wants to go there because of  how good it is ;) 5/5!!!
This Gym has everything I am looking for,  it has  all the equipment to keep my fitness goals in check! lots of squat racks, good classes and its own spin studio - saves me money on soulcycle lol
They have day passes for $15 CAD. The gym is perfect size and they have a variety of classes to choose. Very clean and well kept.
Out of all the gyms I ve been to and had memberships at, this is the best. 5/5 my perfect workout environment
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you for your 5 Star Review Bardya! Were thrilled to hear that you are enjoying your experience at this location.

reviews.review_text: great gym, the 24 hours makes it very convenient. Equipment is all great, but can be very busy at times.
Staff so nice and open layout gym

There is a prolific offender going around in the basement parking lot breaking into cars.  Burnaby RCMP knows who you are as they lifted prints off of my car from the third time you broke into it and there is a warrant out for your arrest.
Well deserving of 5 stars ,  lots of new equipment,  spin classes, body pump classes,  immaculate change rooms, Outfitted with saunas.   Open 24 hours .
7 squat racks, 2 deadlift platforms, plenty of machines and free underground parking. Love this gym.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you for the 5 star review Kiel! We hope you have an amazing workout on your next visit to the club

reviews.review_text: Great location. Free parking. A bit busy at times but overall great gym with most of what you need.
The staff is friendly and professional, they have enough machines and weights for a lot of people at once, and they have large changerooms and showers. Kinda exactly what anybody looks for in a gym.
Great gym with impeccably clean conditions, amazing facilities.The dry sauna and the massage chairs are worth a membership alone.
Best gym in burnaby! Open 24/7. Loads of equipment/ virtual spinning/ yoga classes. Very clean .
Came to Burnaby on a work trip and the gym staff was very welcoming making getting in my competition prep while away easy and stress free. Thank you!
Equipment is quite new, 24/7 gym, has their own parking, spacious and has personal trainers/classes
Great professional customer service and good equipment.
Greatest gym. Rockstar staff. All around 5-stars for the Allstars at this GoodLife. Keep up the great work.
Clean environment but it is always crowded
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you for the 5 star rating!

reviews.review_text: The staff is amazing, the manager is a total stud and it s by far the best gym in the area.
Love the gym, great atmosphere. Bumped into Ben the GM and he was very helpful and friendly. Thanks guys!
Great facility, equipment and friendly staff who are both helpful and knowledgeable!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you for sharing this wonderful rating and feedback!

reviews.review_text: Nice, big, bright club with huge windows and a massive stretching and lunging area.  My wife likes the womens area.
So far I like that location, staff are very welcome and sauna is very good one.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Were happy to hear youre enjoying the Club, Olga! Thank you for taking the time to write a review.

reviews.review_text: spacious gym with wide range of equipment and including dry sauna and group fitness room
Spacious, clean, 24 hrs, has its own parking lot! Also offers personal trainers and classes
Very spacious
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you for your review, Jerry! We are looking forward to seeing you at your next workout.

reviews.review_text: Tristan sets the bar for excellence in customer service.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you for sharing this wonderful rating and feedback!

reviews.review_text: Great staff, equipment and facility. 5 stars!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you for the fantastic review and rating!

reviews.review_text: Best gym in the city
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you for sharing this excellent rating and feedback!

reviews.review_text: I like this GL. Very big, lots of machines, and it was never really super busy.
Please put a GoodLife fitness gym in north Vancouver with a swimming pool.  North Vancouver needs a private gym with a swimming pool
Best in the area, decent price (approximately $35 biweekly on a 1 year commitment)
Convenient gym with great membership plans and a variety of ways to help you have a good life.
I love this gym!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you for sharing this excellent rating and feedback! We love you too!

reviews.review_text: great place clean and equipment is good lots of space and staff are awesome
nice staff , nice place , good quality machines and clean gym
Is amazing!! The staff is so nice and you can find everything in there! Love it
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Good morning, Angelica. Were happy you love your Club! We have forwarded your kind words to the team. Have a wonderful day.

reviews.review_text: Its so big and nice looking, I had a good time :)
Like to workout here, good selection of classes and equipment, friendly staffs
Great space, excellent cycling classes, the equipment is in great condition...
I like guys who working there. They are all responsible
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you for the amazing rating and feedback Orkan!

reviews.review_text: Busy but its got enough power racks and platforms, etc.
I love this gym. Its big and clean.
The place is huge. There arent a lot of people in the morning so the wait time is short.
Friendly staff, clean gym, and the equipment is in good condition!
Amazing staff and good place to workout
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Awesome! Thank you for your Review!

reviews.review_text: Everything is clean and new. You wont be disappointed I highly recommend it
Many equipments and great services
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you for the wonderful 5-star review, Affan! We hope you have another great workout on your next visit

reviews.review_text: Great facility , top quality Equiptment .  Very clean.
I go here every day so obviously I love it.
Excellent location! One of the best GoodLife locations I have visited!
Great Gym has almost everything you need at a gy
